list.name: Default
list.comment:
Added the file system to the server (is able now to read and write in virtual directories)
added the request factory and some other "framework" classes, normally we can start now implementing the request responses (without worrying to much about the rest)

task.summary: added general structure and a parser
added general structure and a parser
command line +/- ready (still some minor bugs)
command line ready and basic get request ready for action (server implementation will be initialized shortly after)

Added the server (not operational)
the server can do the following things: 1. create new connections and assign new threads to them 2. read requests from the stream 3. parse commands 4. the response classes are already created but not yet implemented

Added the file system to the server (is able now to read and write in virtual directories)
added the request factory and some other "framework" classes, normally we can start now implementing the request responses (without worrying to much about the rest)
The get request is working header and put are also implemented but could not be tested yet

added the request factory and some other "framework" classes, normally we can start now implementing the request responses (without worrying to much about the rest)
